block.minecraft.stone.tooltip.summary: Generates when Flowing Lava touches a Source of Water.
item.botania.twig_wand{color1:0,color2:0: Used to rotate Mana Spreaders and view their burst paths, check the Mana stored in a Mana Pool, activate or check the progress of a Botanical Brewery or Runic Altar, and bind generating or functional flora to nearby Mana Pools or Spreaders.
item.botania.twig_wand.tooltip: Used to rotate Mana Spreaders and view their burst paths, check the Mana stored in a Mana Pool, activate or check the progress of a Botanical Brewery or Runic Altar, and bind generating or functional flora to nearby Mana Pools or Spreaders.
item.minecraft.stick.tooltip: A pice of wood from wood
item.botania.incense_plate.tooltip: Once an Incense Stick is placed onto it, right-clicking with a Flint and Steel will ignite the stick. This can also be done with a Mana burst with the Kindle Lens. Also accept items from a Hopper or any other inputting mechanism. It will also emit Comparator signals, where 1 signals there is a stick present, and 2 signals the stick is currently burning.
generator.minecraft.normal.info: A small, dead, irradiated planet called Chroma Prime. It's all I have, lets make the most of it.
